import React, {Component} from 'react' import { API_BASE } from '../constants'; import { Card } from 'semantic-ui-react' class Room extends Component { render() { const { humidity, light, name, pet_access, room_plants, temp_F } = this.props.room return ( {name}
{name}
{temp_F}°F Temperature
{humidity}% Humidity
{pet_access ? "" : "No"} Pets Allowed
{temp_F}°F Temperature
{humidity}% Humidity
{pet_access ? "" : "No"} Pets Allowed
) } } export default Room
